languages.text: If only one of the wearer's {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area is active in combat, the wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者の戦闘戦術エリアのうち1つだけが戦闘中に有効な場合、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}を+20獲得する。
